marklogic.body: Please, in the name of all that is Holy, do not allow Peaceville to cut any songs the album. I would love to see all 13 songs make it onto the record. I am still waiting for a worthy version of VIVA EMPTINESS with 'Wait Outside' and THE GREAT COLD DISTANCE with 'Dissolving Bonds', 'Displaced', 'Code Against The Code' and 'Unfurl' to be released so I can have all Katatonia albums in complete form with nothing missing. Katatonia has ruined so many other bands for me by proving how inferior the others all were, so now I need as many new Katatonia songs as possible to help fill in the void.
